detail.description: KOEL, one of the flagship companies of the Kirloskar group, manufactures and services diesel engines and diesel generator sets. The company also makes diesel, petrol and kerosene-based pump sets. It has manufacturing units in Pune, Kagal, and Nashik. The company caters to the agriculture, power generation, and industrial sectors.[1]
